body:
I just got a gold membership on my xbox and wanted to try it out; so I was wondering if anyone has xbox live gold and would like to join me in a game of call of duty ghosts. Just add me on Skype (mynameiseileen) and let me know when :D

Oh and btw Im not really that good at this game yet (level 3) so just bear with me :P
